column2: "What's up, girlie? Find something out?"
"...Luther's death seems to have been the trigger for unlocking these facilities. The timing matches perfectly."
"In addition, there's a lot of information. This could have been used as the main terminal for the facilities at the seabed."
"Included in that data... seems to be information on creature experimentation."
"The experiments conducted on local Vopar natives include organic remodeling, synthesis, and experiments to implant intelligence artificially..."
"By any chance, does the intelligence implantation experiment refer to us?"
"Judging from the data, that seems to be the correct conclusion... I'm sorry."
"Why are you apologizing, girlie? You neither came up with the experiment nor did it yourself."
"I'm not really looking for an apology, and haven't thought of asking for one either. I can talk, and that's pretty convenient, ya know?"
"Don't apologize without a reason, girlie. That kinda hurts, seeing you sympathize without knowing."
"...Hey, you're quite cool, aren't you?"
"Did ya fall for me? I already have Camarotz, someone I treasure."
"Enough with the stupid jokes for now. ...Hmmm, this info. The protection on it is very heavy."
"Claris Claes purification data? That's my purification data. But the specimen name is Sara..."
"...That's right. It was here."
"The place where they experimented on me at their whim, was here."
"Hey, Sara, could you be...?"
"You're shocked, aren't you? Finding out that you are a clone."
"I saw the evidence myself after all. But I've already gotten over it."
"I've been confused, I've cried too. Even now, I would be lying if I said I'm fine. But I can still bear it."
"More importantly, tell me. Are you my original?"
"Ah, Hey! Wait! <%me>! We're following her!"
